page.title: 16Industrial Estate, Clacton
page.content:
{Gorse Lane Industrial Estate}was a clean estate when it first opened, but now it has turned into a place where there's nothing but rubbish. Most of the factories are not used or have closed down.
There has been a report on the estate in a local newspaper which said that it is dirty, scruffy and there's lots of overgrown weeds with the rubbish.
The council said only 10 units closed out of 110 small units isn't bad at all, but the larger units on the site and in Davey road were not included in those figures.
